name: Space Mission - Predicting Learning Performance
description:
5 mins for the education research ! Please try to finish the whole game to provide us with the valid data. Thank you very much for helping the improvements of the education. :)

The is a research game which looks at how people can be trained in the best way. By playing this game, you will be distributed to a random training method. All sessions will only take you 5 mins to finish!
